mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Wishes more information about his improvement of fireplaces; most of them lose heat without heating the room; has asked Mr. Fulton to examine his fireplace; asks for rough drawing; might order fireplace as soon as sea should be open for its passage.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1813 March 8, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia] to Abraham Howard Quincy, n.p.
